label: Cena 1 — Abertura: personagem acorda
prompt: A young woman slowly wakes up in a sunlit bedroom. She stretches her arms, soft morning light filters through white curtains, warm and cinematic atmosphere.

label: Cena 2 — Extensão: ela se levanta e olha pela janela
prompt: She walks to the window and looks outside at the city below, contemplative expression, golden hour lighting.

label: Cena 3 — Transição: close no rosto [ZOOM_IN_CUT]
prompt: [ZOOM_IN_CUT] Close-up on her face, eyes full of determination, shallow depth of field, cinematic portrait.

label: Cena 4 — Externa: ela sai do prédio
prompt: The young woman exits a glass building into a busy urban street, confident stride, morning rush hour, realistic city environment.

label: Cena 5 — Narração: personagem fala para câmera
prompt: A confident young woman speaking directly to camera, natural expression, urban background slightly blurred.
